name: Night Strider
description:
Night Strider is a first-person parkour game where you run across various challenges to try to get as far as possible. By utilizing various movement abilities, the player is able to traverse the environment for a time until they fall. They will then attempt the run again with more experience and an all new procedurally generated world each time. The goal of the game is to create a freeing and fast-paced experience for players, rewarding skillful movement with greater distance.

Music is Retrograde by Patricia Taxxon
